thread.title: Bruce: Mostly dry, warmer through the end of the week
thread.title_full: Bruce: Mostly dry, warmer through the end of the week - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: Bruce Katz
title: Bruce: Mostly dry, warmer through the end of the week
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - East and southeast winds are bringing in moisture from the gulf, allowing more clouds and coastal showers to develop. These winds could also lead to some minor coastal flooding.
A few stray showers, like yesterday, are possible for the next few days, but coverage remains less than 20%. By Sunday, however, tropical moisture comes surging back over the area with a developing surface low.
This will finally bring rain back to the region. It looks like the rain may stick around through early Wednesday. We could use the rain.
Follow me on Twitter: @BruceKatzFOX8
- Meteorologist Bruce Katz
